article.title: Intel Community Campus to Receive $499 Million Renovation
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: The Whiting-Turner Contracting Co., Baltimore, Md., was awarded a $499 million firm-fixed-price contract for the renovation of the Intelligence Community Campus at Bethesda, Md. The U.S. Army Corps of Engineers, Baltimore, Md., is the contracting activity.
